title: Wage and salary workers in the U.S. : hourly earnings 1979 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Wage in current U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 40.
In general Wage in current U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Wage in current U.S. dollars, about 14.99 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Wage in current U.S. dollars about 4.44 was reached at Year 1979
